practiceMsg:
Answer 40 practice questions.

No time limit.
testMsg:
Answer 15 questions.

Score 75% or above in 10 mins to pass the test
earnMsg: Watch sponsored content to earn +3 credits?

questions.questionText: Which movie features the character Luke Skywalker and his battle against the Galactic Empire?
Which movie is about a group of superheroes, including Iron Man, Captain America, and Thor, teaming up to save the world?
Which movie is about a young wizard named Harry Potter and his adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?
options: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

questions.questionText: Which movie tells the story of a clownfish named Nemo who gets separated from his father and embarks on a journey to find him?
Which movie features a young lion named Simba and his journey to reclaim his kingdom from his uncle Scar?
Which movie is about a robot named WALL-E who falls in love and embarks on a space adventure?
Which movie is a sci-fi epic set in a post-apocalyptic world and follows the journey of a man named Neo, who discovers the truth about his reality?
Which movie is a romantic comedy about a woman named Bridget Jones and her quest for love?
Which movie is about a group of friends who go on a road trip to find a dead body and learn important life lessons along the way?
Which movie is about a young girl named Dorothy who is transported to a magical land called Oz?
Which movie tells the story of a young boy named Elliot who befriends an extraterrestrial being?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.questionText: Which movie is about a criminal mastermind named Hannibal Lecter and the FBI agent who seeks his help to catch another serial killer?
Which movie is a fantasy adventure about a young girl named Dorothy who is transported to a mystical world and must defeat a wicked witch?
Which movie is about a group of astronauts who embark on a mission to save Earth by traveling through a wormhole?
Which movie tells the story of a young ballerina who gets caught up in a supernatural rivalry between the White Swan and the Black Swan?
Which movie is about a man named Forrest Gump and his extraordinary life journey?
Which movie is a romantic drama about a young couple who fall in love despite their cultural differences?
Which movie is about a young woman who becomes the assistant to a demanding fashion magazine editor?
Which movie is a sci-fi thriller about a team of explorers who travel through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet?
Which movie is about a young man named Will Hunting who possesses extraordinary mathematical abilities?
Which movie is about a high school teacher who inspires his students through unorthodox teaching methods?
Which movie is about a group of rebels who embark on a mission to steal the plans for the Death Star?
options: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

questions.questionText: Which movie tells the story of a young girl who is swept away to a magical world where she encounters various colorful characters?
Which movie is about a young boy who discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical schoolof witchcraft and wizardry?
options: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

questions.questionText: Which movie is a classic romantic comedy about two people who meet on a ship and fall in love despite being from different social classes?
Which movie is about a group of thieves who plan and execute a heist on the Bellagio, Mirage, and MGM Grand casinos in Las Vegas?
Which movie is about a young girl who is accidentally left behind by her family during Christmas and must defend her home from burglars?
Which movie is a fantasy adventure about a young girl who enters a magical world through a wardrobe and helps to defeat an evil witch?
options: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

questions.questionText: Which movie is a sci-fi action film about a cyborg assassin who travels back in time to kill the mother of a future resistance leader?
Which movie is a coming-of-age drama about a young boy who befriends a creature from another planet and helps him return home?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.questionText: Which movie is a psychological thriller about a man who suffers from short-term memory loss and tries to solve the mystery of his wife's murder?
Which movie is about a group of misfit kids who go on an adventure to find a hidden treasure and encounter dangerous criminals?
Which movie is a musical romantic comedy about a woman who loves singing and the man who helps her achieve her dreams?
Which movie is about a young girl who discovers her magical powers and must save her kingdom from an eternal winter?
Which movie is a sci-fi thriller about a hacker who discovers the true nature of reality and leads a rebellion against machines?
Which movie is a comedy about a man who is cursed to live the same day over and over again until he learns the value of selflessness?
Which movie is a romantic drama about a young couple who meet on a train and spend a magical night together in Vienna?
options: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

questions.questionText: Which movie is a crime drama about two mob hitmen who have philosophical discussions while carrying out their assignments?
Which movie is a fantasy adventure about a young boy who discovers he is a wizard and must defeat a dark wizard?
options: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

questions.questionText: Which movie is a romantic comedy about a woman who hires a male escort to pose as her boyfriend for a family event?
Which movie is a superhero film about a billionaire genius who builds a high-tech suit to become a crime-fighting vigilante?
